title: Spicy Cucumber-Avocado Soup
directions: Peel and pit avocado. Blend all ingredients in a blender until very smooth, about 1 minute.
ingredients: 1 3/4 English cucumbers (1 1/2 pounds), cut into 1/2-inch pieces
1/2 teaspoon chopped fresh jalapeño chile with seeds
Garnish: diced avocado and chopped chives
